tika-abh08t16:2_2: anāgate aṁsā koṭṭhāsā tesaṁ ñāṇaṁ anāgataṁsañāṇaṁ.
tika-abh08t16:3_1: Cittasannissitaṁ katvāti taṁ kāyaṁ cittaṁ sannissitaṁ karitvā tameva kāyacittacetasikavasena mahaggate cittasmiṁ samāropeti ñāṇaṁ iddhividhañāṇaṁ,
tika-abh08t16:3_2: tato kāyārammaṇato kāyassa parittattā kāmāvacarattā parittārammaṇaṁ ñāṇaṁ siyā.
tika-abh08t16:4_1: gantukāmo yadā bhave yo yogī dissamānena kāyena gantukāmo yadā bhaveyya,
tika-abh08t16:4_2: so yogī tadā cittaṁ kāyasannissitaṁ katvā rūpakāye sannissitaṁ katvā taṁ pādakajjhānacittaṁ kāyavasena kāye āropeti,
tika-abh08t16:4_3: tadā jhānārammaṇato taṁ ñāṇaṁ mahaggatagocaraṁ hoti,
tika-abh08t16:4_8: Dissamānena kāyena tassa bhikkhuno gamane pana sati tassa yogino ñāṇassa gocaro paccuppanno nāma hoti,
tika-abh08t16:5_3: iti pariṇāmanakālasmiṁ tassa yogino ñāṇaṁ ajjhattārammaṇaṁ siyā.
tika-abh08t16:7_0: 1122.Etassa cetopariyañāṇassa maggārammaṇatā pariyāyena eva matā ñātā.
tika-abh08t16:9_0: Tattha tesu paccuppannesu yaṁ paccuppannaṁ khaṇādikaṁ tikkhaṇasampattaṁ uppādaṭṭhitibhaṅgakkhaṇasampattaṁ
tika-abh08t16:9_1: khaṇādikaṁ khaṇāyeva taṁ khaṇāvayavaṁ paccuppannaṁ nāma.
tika-abh08t16:10_3: tesaṁ dvinnaṁ āvajjanajavanacittānaṁ sahaṭṭhānassa abhāvā taṁ “khaṇādikattayaṁ paccuppanna”ntiādikaṁ “ekassa cittamekena,
tika-abh08t16:10_4: avassaṁ pana vijjhati”iti pariyosānaṁ vacanaṁ na yujjati.
tika-abh08t16:10_5: Āvajjanajavanānaṁ nānārammaṇabhāvaṁ pattito āpajjanato ca na yujjati.
tika-abh08t16:10_6: Aniṭṭhe pana ṭhāne tesaṁ āvajjanajavanānaṁ ekārammaṇabhāve anicchite tasmiṁ ṭhāne na yujjati,
tika-abh08t16:10_7: aññasmiṁ pana ṭhāne maggavīthiyaṁ āvajjanaparikammajavanānaṁ kasiṇādikaṁ ārammaṇaṁ hoti,
tika-abh08t16:11_2: paccuppannanti pacchima”nti vatvā puna aññena pariyāyena taṁ paccuppannaṁ dassetuṁ idaṁ addhākhyaṁ addhānāma paccuppannaṁ javanavārato dīpetabbaṁ.
tika-abh08t16:11_4: Yadā iddhimā yogī parassa cittaṁ ñātuṁ āvajjati,
tika-abh08t16:11_5: tassa āvajjanamano paccuppannakhaṇavhayaṁ paccuppannaṁ manodvārāvajjanacittaṁ ārammaṇaṁ katvā tena cittena saddhiṁ nirujjhati,
tika-abh08t16:11_9: pañcannaṁ javanānaṁ yaṁ pacchimaṁ cittaṁ iddhicittamudīritaṁ.
tika-abh08t16:11_11: Etesaṁ kāmāvacare iddhijavanānaṁ tadeva ca paracittaṁ ārammaṇaṁ hoti yasmā,
tika-abh08t16:11_12: tasmā sabbāni tāni javanāni ekārammaṇataṁ yanti,
tika-abh08t16:11_13: tesaṁ javanānaṁ nānārammaṇatā addhāvasā na bhaveyya,
tika-abh08t16:11_14: paccuppannārammaṇato tesaṁ javanānaṁ ekārammaṇabhāvepi iddhimānasameva ca parassa cittaṁ jānāti.
tika-abh08t16:11_15: Itarāni kāmāvacarāni pana cittāni parassa cittaṁ na jānanti.
tika-abh08t16:11_16: Yathā cakkhudvāre tu viññāṇanti cakkhuviññāṇaṁ rūpaṁ passati,
tika-abh08t16:12_0: 1161.Anāgataṁsañāṇassāti anāgataṁsañāṇassa anāgataṁ dhammaṁ agocaraṁ, gocaraṁ na hotiyevāti attho.
tika-abh08t16:13_2: taṁ madhuratthamatinīharaṁ uttamaṁ sotujanassa hadayaṁ pītikaraṁ sacetano ko nāma manujo na suṇeyya.
